com.clover.sdk.v1.merchant

Class MerchantIntent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clover.sdk.v1.merchant.MerchantIntent

  • public class MerchantIntent
extends java.lang.Object
    Definition of actions and extras for communicating with IMerchantService.
    See Also:
    IMerchantService

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ACTION_MERCHANT_CHANGED
      Broadcast action: the merchant has changed.
      static java.lang.String ACTION_MERCHANT_SERVICE
      Service action: bind to the merchant service.

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_MERCHANT_SERVICE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_MERCHANT_SERVICE
        Service action: bind to the merchant service.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_MERCHANT_CHANGED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_MERCHANT_CHANGED
        Broadcast action: the merchant has changed. Intents received with this action will contain extra Intents.EXTRA_ACCOUNT and Intents.EXTRA_MERCHANT_ID.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        public static android.accounts.Account getAccount(android.content.Intent intent)
        Extract the Account from the given intent's extras Bundle.
        Parameters:
        intent - An intent.
        Returns:
        An Account, or null if the account extra is not present.

      • getVersion

        public static int getVersion(android.content.Intent intent)
        Extract the version from the given intent's extras Bundle.
        Parameters:
        intent - An intent.
        Returns:
        An int, or 1 if the version extra is not present.

      • getMerchantId

        public static java.lang.String getMerchantId(android.content.Intent intent)
        Extract the merchant ID from the given intent's extras Bundle.
        Parameters:
        intent - An intent.
        Returns:
        As String, or null if the merchant ID extra is not present.
